name: The golden girl Cloud top board
name_original: The golden girl Cloud top board
description:
It is a tactical magic battle game.4 girls come to Genting, they are ready to compete here. In each match, killing a specified enemy is considered a victory. Different cosmetic treatments can have different effects. After entering the game, click Start Game to enter the battlefield. Click the character button below to summon the girl girl. The enemy will automatically summon the girl, you need to kill a certain number of enemies to count as victory. The end of the game countdown has not completed the kill mission as a failure.

Game Features:
⚪ Bikini girl, super eye candy.
⚪ Beautiful scenes, cool special effects.
⚪ Instant policy, specify tactics.
⚪ Multi-language, to meet the needs.
